docs.lead_paragraph: The Keystone XL oil pipeline won't have to use American steel in its construction, despite what President Donald Trump says.

headline.print_headline: Keystone Pipeline Won't Have to Be Built Using US Steel
headline.main: Keystone Pipeline Won't Have to Be Built Using US Steel

docs.snippet: The Keystone XL oil pipeline won't have to use American steel in its construction, despite what President Donald Trump says....

docs.lead_paragraph: Sore ribs or sore stomach, it doesn't seem to matter to Rory McIlroy. After being gone for seven weeks, he took a two-shot lead into the weekend at the Mexico Championship with a chance to return to No. 1 in the world.

headline.print_headline: Rory McIlroy Feeling Better, Takes 2-Shot Lead in Mexico
headline.main: Rory McIlroy Feeling Better, Takes 2-Shot Lead in Mexico

docs.snippet: Sore ribs or sore stomach, it doesn't seem to matter to Rory McIlroy. After being gone for seven weeks, he took a two-shot lead into the weekend at the Mexico Championship with a chance to return to No. 1 in the world....

docs.lead_paragraph: The deportation of a Houston-area father after his temporary reprieve was revoked following new enforcement rules enacted by President Donald Trump is an example of a U.S. immigration policy that's going after good people, his attorney said Friday.

headline.print_headline: Deported Texas Man's Lawyer: Policy Goes After Good People
headline.main: Deported Texas Man's Lawyer: Policy Goes After Good People

docs.snippet: The deportation of a Houston-area father after his temporary reprieve was revoked following new enforcement rules enacted by President Donald Trump is an example of a U.S. immigration policy that's going after good people, his attorney said Friday...

docs.lead_paragraph: Caterpillar Inc was sued on Friday for allegedly deceiving shareholders about its business, one day after federal law enforcers raided three of its buildings in connection with a probe into the heavy machinery manufacturer's offshore tax practices.

headline.print_headline: Caterpillar Is Sued by a Shareholder After Federal Raid
headline.main: Caterpillar Is Sued by a Shareholder After Federal Raid

docs.snippet: Caterpillar Inc was sued on Friday for allegedly deceiving shareholders about its business, one day after federal law enforcers raided three of its buildings in connection with a probe into the heavy machinery manufacturer's offshore tax practices...

docs.lead_paragraph: The UFC has become an anchor tenant of new T-Mobile Arena, committing to bringing several years of Las Vegas fight cards exclusively to the new entertainment venue.

headline.print_headline: UFC Establishes Long-Term Home at Vegas' New T-Mobile Arena
headline.main: UFC Establishes Long-Term Home at Vegas' New T-Mobile Arena

docs.snippet: The UFC has become an anchor tenant of new T-Mobile Arena, committing to bringing several years of Las Vegas fight cards exclusively to the new entertainment venue....

docs.lead_paragraph: A judge on Friday began weighing the fate of two federal lawsuits in Kansas challenging the constitutionality of a state law that requires prospective voters to prove their U.S. citizenship.

headline.print_headline: US Judge Defers Ruling in Kansas Voting Citizenship Case
headline.main: US Judge Defers Ruling in Kansas Voting Citizenship Case

docs.snippet: A judge on Friday began weighing the fate of two federal lawsuits in Kansas challenging the constitutionality of a state law that requires prospective voters to prove their U.S. citizenship....

docs.lead_paragraph: Miriam Colon, a pioneering actress in U.S. Latino New York theater who starred in films alongside Marlon Brando and Al Pacino, died Friday.

headline.print_headline: Miriam Colon, Iconic US Latina Movie, Theater Actress, Dies
headline.main: Miriam Colon, Iconic US Latina Movie, Theater Actress, Dies

docs.lead_paragraph: The TV network operator plunked down $500 million in the I.P.O. of the popular social media firm as old media hunts for new audiences.

headline.print_headline: For NBCUniversal, Snap Is Fountain of Youth
headline.main: For NBCUniversal, Snap Is Fountain of Youth

docs.snippet: The TV network operator plunked down $500 million in the I.P.O. of the popular social media firm as old media hunts for new audiences....

docs.lead_paragraph: Wildlife advocates are ramping up their campaign against the annual culling of bison that roam onto state lands in Montana each winter from Yellowstone National Park, erecting dramatic billboards showing buffalo bleeding in the snow.

headline.print_headline: Montana Activists Ramp Up Campaign Against Culling Yellowstone Bison
headline.main: Montana Activists Ramp Up Campaign Against Culling Yellowstone Bison

docs.snippet: Wildlife advocates are ramping up their campaign against the annual culling of bison that roam onto state lands in Montana each winter from Yellowstone National Park, erecting dramatic billboards showing buffalo bleeding in the snow....
